conbody.p:
The provides two environment configuration files:
sdc-env.sh - Use when you start the manually.
sdcd.env.sh - Use when you start the as a service. Also defines the Data Collector user, group, and directories.

Both environment configuration files include the following environment variables:
SDC_ROOT_CLASSPATH Defines the path to jar files to be added to the root classloader. Use for components that must be in the root classloader, such as Snappy.
SDC_JAVA_OPTS Defines additional Java configuration options for the . By default, this property includes the heap size for the .
